allowed_values.services: I provide services related to Backdrop CMS
allowed_values.documentation: I write/update documentation for Backdrop CMS
allowed_values.design: I provide designs for Backdrop CMS (core or contrib)
allowed_values.issues: I create/comment on issues for Backdrop CMS on GitHub (core or contrib)
allowed_values.prs: I create Pull Requests against Backdrop CMS (core or contrib)
allowed_values.review-prs: I review Pull Requests against Backdrop CMS (core or contrib)
allowed_values.modules: I create/maintain modules for Backdrop CMS
allowed_values.themes: I create/maintain themes for Backdrop CMS
allowed_values.layouts: I create/maintain layouts for Backdrop CMS
allowed_values.design-borg: I provide designs for backdropcms.org (or other Backdrop properties)
allowed_values.issues-borg: I create/comment on issues for backdropcms.org (or other Backdrop properties)
allowed_values.prs-borg: I create Pull Requests against backdropcms.org (or other Backdrop properties)
allowed_values.review-prs-borg: I review Pull Requests against backdropcms.org (or other Backdrop properties)
allowed_values.support: I give support in live chat, via Zulip, Gitter or IRC
allowed_values.forum: I answer questions in the Backdrop Forum
allowed_values.dollars: I have made a financial donation to the Backdrop Foundation
